projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: My personal website to showcase my experience and skills.

projects.title: MTG Search Discord Bot
projects.description: A Discord bot written in Python to search for a specified card using the MTG API and Beautiful Soup 4. The bot is hosted on a Raspberry Pi R3

projects.title: Discord LED Monitor
projects.description: Threaded program written in Python to constantly read the user voice status in Discord. The status will be displayed using LEDs. The device is run on an Arduino Uno with PyFirmata loaded on.

projects.title: ShiftOutPy
projects.description: ShiftOut code adapted to Python from Arduino. The code is made to be used with a 74HC595, an 8-bit Shift Register.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a new graduate at Missouri University of Science and Technology with a passion for microcontrollers and programming . I majored in Computer Engineering and minored in History. In my spare time I like to work on small projects, learning new concepts, and working with electronics. Outside of programming, I enjoying playing games with friends and reading.
